thread.title: Amber Rose dubbed worst player on 'Watch What Happens Live'
thread.title_full: Amber Rose dubbed worst player on 'Watch What Happens Live'

author: Layla A. Jones
title: Amber Rose dubbed worst player on 'Watch What Happens Live'
text:
Entertainment Amber Rose dubbed worst player on 'Watch What Happens Live' Amber Rose has never been one to mince words. But on Sunday night's Watch What Happens Live, the South Philly vixen was pretty much speechless. Amber Rose dubbed worst player on 'Watch What Happens Live' Amber Rose refused to answer every question during a game of "Plead the Fifth" on "Watch What Happens Live." Bravo screenshot Travel Deals Layla A. Jones Posted: Monday, October 26, 2015, 11:21 AM 
Amber Rose has never been one to mince words. But on Sunday night’s Watch What Happens Live, the South Philly vixen was pretty much speechless. 
Host Andy Cohen runs a segment on WWHL called “Plead the Fifth.” During the game, show guests are asked three questions and can only refuse to answer, or plead the fifth to, one of them. Rose, though, created her own set of rules. 
The first question Cohen went to ask was about the Kardashians, a group of women Rose has fallen out with publically more than once. Before he could even complete the question—“Rank these Kardashian-Jenners from least…”—Rose cut him off, using her first, and supposedly only, plead the fifth option. 
Except, it wasn’t. 
By the conclusion of the segment, Cohen said Rose did, “the worst job in the history of Watch What Happens Live playing this game.”
